Articles.Content:
Soooo, I got really bored, and if you saw in the OKB-1 Rocket builders thread, i build things that use ramps when I'm bored...

so now i present to you, the tank carrier!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

its very basic, try to keep under 1/3 of thrust, 1 deploys KV-1's Stuff, 2 detaches the KV-1 from the carrier. It is self sustaining during day, it will eventually lost power during night (with the lights on) but you can just add more RTGs . you can get it to shore using the wheels. You also need to select control from here on the probe core on the back to control it properly in water. I also recommend not to time warp while on land

I also couldn't believe no one though of this before, also, feel free to build troop carriers and tank carriers for different tanks, i won't because I'm not really a Military guy who likes building war related things

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ytv2k8tojoae8hg/Tank%20carrier.craft

Also you may re-purpose this

KV-1 Is a Property of Zokesia Skunkworks.

Edited September 8, 2013 by M.Wolfy
Hmmmm. Perhaps I could turn this into some way to deliver modules to a base across short distances of ocean . . .

Soooo, I got really bored, and if you saw in the OKB-1 Rocket builders thread, i build things that use ramps when I'm bored...

so now i present to you, the tank carrier!

its very basic, try to keep under 1/3 of thrust, 1 deploys KV-1's Stuff, 2 detaches the KV-1 from the carrier. It is self sustaining during day, it will eventually lost power during night (with the lights on) but you can just add more RTGs . you can get it to shore using the wheels. You also need to select control from here on the probe core on the back to control it properly in water.

I also couldn't believe no one though of this before, also, feel free to build troop carriers and tank carriers for different tanks, i won't because I'm not really a Military guy who likes building war related things

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ytv2k8tojoae8hg/Tank%20carrier.craft

KV-1 Is a Property of Zokesia Skunkworks.

I for one welcome you as our new overlord and hereby offer my services as assistant junta for your post coup workers paradise.

Cupcake...

Edited September 8, 2013 by Cupcake...

Cupcake...

Like i said, I'm not really a military guy who likes building war related things

i just got bored and built something for the sake of it

i just got bored and built something for the sake of it

Phew, you had me worried there. Okay, I'll go back to doing the ironing.

Cupcake...
All of a sudden i get bored and start building more navy craft... what is happening to me
This is really cool. How many parts?

I was looking at the tank pulling out and i was like "Is that my tank?" Yes it is.

Wonderful product you got here.

EDIT can i put it on the ZS page?

Edited September 8, 2013 by zekes

I was looking at the tank pulling out and i was like "Is that my tank?" Yes it is.

Wonderful product you got here.

Sure

(10 chars)

This is really cool. How many parts?

438 including KV-1

197 without KV-1
